entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Friday 14 April 2023
